Docs.returns: The base URI as <xref:System.String>.

.method public static hidebysig float64 MSStringCompare(string s1, string s2, string lang, string options) cil managed

Docs.param: Specifies whether the comparison is case-sensitive.

Docs.returns: If < the method returns -1. If == the method returns 0. If > the method returns 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string MSUtc (string dateTime);
.method public static hidebysig string MSUtc(string dateTime) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implements the [Microsoft XPath extension function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143943).
Docs.returns: A string that contains date/time information. If a string cannot be interpreted as a valid XSD date/time-related format, it returns an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Converts date/time-related values into Coordinated Universal Time and into a fixed (normalized) representation that can be sorted and compared lexicographically.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string NormalizeSpace (string value);
.method public static hidebysig string NormalizeSpace(string value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes leading and trailing spaces from the specified string and returns the result. Implements function from the [W3C XPath standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
Docs.returns: A normalized string.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string OuterXml (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator);
.method public static hidebysig string OuterXml(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the node and all child nodes of the node identified by the argument.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the opening and closing tags of the node and all child nodes of the node that is identified by the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double Round (double value);
.method public static hidebysig float64 Round(float64 value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Rounds value by using XPath rounding rules. Rounds towards positive infinity. Values between -0.5 and -0.0 are rounded to -0.0 (negative zero).
Docs.returns: The rounded number as <xref:System.Double>.

Docs.returns: if the first argument string starts with the second argument string; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public static string SubstringAfter (string s1, string s2);
.method public static hidebysig string SubstringAfter(string s1, string s2) cil managed

Docs.param: The string in which to locate s2.
Docs.summary: Implements XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
Docs.returns: The characters in s1 that occur after s2, or the empty string if s1 does not contain s2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Locates a substring (s2) within a string (s1), and returns the characters in s1 that occur after s2.

Docs.returns: The characters in s1 that occur before s2, or the empty string if s1 does not contain s2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Locates a substring (s2) within a string (s1), and returns the characters in s1 that occur before s2.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Translate (string arg, string mapString, string transString);
.method public static hidebysig string Translate(string arg, string mapString, string transString) cil managed

Docs.param: The substring in `arg` that should be replaced with `transString`.
Docs.summary: Implements XPath function according to the [W3C specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=4873).
Docs.returns: The translated value as <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Converts a string (`arg`) by replacing the characters in a substring (`mapString`) with the characters in another string (`tranString`).
